Description:
Job Responsibilities:Preparing and presenting Telecom solutions to new and existing customers, with a focus on Tetra/
Telecom services/ Radio Communication
Assisting in commercial and technical Bid Proposals.
Ability to create Architectural diagrams and project plans for Telecom solutionsSkills
Skills:
Outstanding presentation preparation and delivery skills
Strong Knowledge on DMR, Tetra Solutions.
5+ years of mandatory Experience in Radio Communication.
Customer-focused with the ability to influence others to achieve results
Bachelor Degree from a recognized university institution.
